name: Community Outreach Education (COE) Program
description: A presentation and packet of information that promotes fire and life safety, information aimed at reducing the risk of fires and preventing property damage due to fires, as well as answers to questions. The fire and life safety presentation lasts approximately 60 minutes and will include: - Home escape planning; - Top causes of fire in the home, with tips to help prevent them; - Information about carbon monoxide and smoke alarms; - Fire extinguisher operation demonstration, with a practice sessi
